trans-unit.source: Allows Visual Studio to communicate internally with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Permite que o Visual Studio se comunique internamente com o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control is browsing a COM object and the user renames the object.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> estiver navegando em um objeto COM e o usuário renomeia o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Only a change of value of the property that corresponds to DISPID_Name for the COM object raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComponentModel.Com2Interop.IComPropertyBrowser.ComComponentNameChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera apenas uma alteração do valor da propriedade que corresponde ao DISPID_Name para o objeto COM o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComponentModel.Com2Interop.IComPropertyBrowser.ComComponentNameChanged> evento.

trans-unit.source: Closes any open drop-down controls on the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Fecha os controles da lista suspensa abertos no controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: Commits all pending changes to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Confirma todas as alterações pendentes para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> successfully commits changes; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> confirmar as alterações com êxito; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Activates the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control when the user chooses **Properties** for a control in Design view.
trans-unit.target: Ativa o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> quando o usuário escolhe **Propriedades** para um controle no modo de exibição de Design.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control is currently setting one of the properties of its selected object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> está configurando uma das propriedades do seu objeto selecionado no momento.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control is currently setting one of the properties of its selected object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> controle está atualmente Configurando uma das propriedades do seu objeto selecionado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The registry key that contains the user states.
trans-unit.target: A chave do Registro que contém os estados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Loads user states from the registry into the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Carrega os estados do usuário do registro para o controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" />.

trans-unit.source: You can save some of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control states, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A> properties, to the registry and load them the next time the user runs your application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode salvar algumas do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> controlar estados, como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A> propriedades, para o registro e a carga-las na próxima vez que o usuário executa o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The registry key that contains the user states.
trans-unit.target: A chave do Registro que contém os estados do usuário.

trans-unit.source: Saves user states from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> control to the registry.
trans-unit.target: Salva os estados do usuário do controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid" /> para o registro.

trans-unit.source: You can save some of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> control states, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A> properties, to the registry and load them the next time the user runs your application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode salvar algumas do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid> controlar estados, como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.PropertySort%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid.HelpVisible%2A> propriedades, para o registro e a carga-las na próxima vez que o usuário executa o aplicativo.
